name: Compensation and Benefits Manager_Dec.2022
description: The Compensation and Benefits Manager Collection, represents the skills necessary for professionals responsible for planning, developing, and overseeing programs that compensate employees. It includes knowledge based on the Society for Human Resource Management (SHRM) and the Association for Talent Development (ATD) standards. Additionally, this collection was developed with hiring managers and employees in the occupational area. RSDs developed with hiring managers and employees in the occupational area.
